languages.text: [draft] ужасный запах, эти гвардейцы не смогли выбраться из грузового контенера

traits.locale_text: [draft] ужасный запах, эти гвардейцы не смогли выбраться из грузового контенера

languages.text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
languages.original_text: От контейнера тяжело пахнет смертью. Судя по маркировкам, гвардейцы оказались там по ошибке. Судя по вмятинам, выбраться им не удалось.

traits.locale_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, it was used for transporting Guardsmen. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.
A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

languages.text: От контейнера тяжело пахнет смертью. Судя по маркировкам, гвардейцы оказались там по ошибке. Судя по вмятинам, выбраться им не удалось.
El fuerte olor de la muerte surge del contenedor. A juzgar por las marcas, varios guardias acabaron dentro por error. Y a juzgar por las abolladuras, no llegaron a salir.
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: El fuerte olor de la muerte surge del contenedor. A juzgar por las marcas, varios guardias acabaron dentro por error. Y a juzgar por las abolladuras, no llegaron a salir.
El fuerte olor de la muerte surge del contenedor. A juzgar por sus marcas, se usó para transportar a soldados de la Guardia. A juzgar por sus abolladuras, nunca consiguieron salir de él.
El fuerte olor de la muerte surge del contenedor. A juzgar por sus marcas, se usó para transportar a soldados de la Guardia. A juzgar por sus abolladuras, nunca consiguieron salir de él.

languages.text: 集装箱里散发着浓烈的尸臭。一群帝国卫队士兵不小心被困在了这个集装箱里，从箱子上的凹痕判断，这些人最终全都死在了里面。
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: 集装箱里散发着浓烈的尸臭。一群帝国卫队士兵不小心被困在了这个集装箱里，从箱子上的凹痕判断，这些人最终全都死在了里面。
集装箱里散发着浓烈的尸臭。从集装箱的标记来看，它应该是用来运送帝国卫队士兵的，但从集装箱上的凹痕判断，这些人全都死在了里面。
集装箱里散发着浓烈的尸臭。从集装箱的标记来看，它应该是用来运送帝国卫队士兵的，但从集装箱上的凹痕判断，这些人全都死在了里面。

languages.text: 死体のひどい腐敗臭がコンテナから広がる。その印から判断するに、何人かのガーズマンたちが誤って中に入れられたようだ。へこみの具合からして、彼らは脱出できなかったのだろう。
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: 死体のひどい腐敗臭がコンテナから広がる。その印から判断するに、何人かのガーズマンたちが誤って中に入れられたようだ。へこみの具合からして、彼らは脱出できなかったのだろう。

languages.text: Der schwere Geruch von Tod dringt aus dem Container nach außen. Den Spuren nach sind einige Gardisten darin gelandet. Und wie es aussieht, kamen sie nicht mehr heraus.
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: Der schwere Geruch von Tod dringt aus dem Container nach außen. Den Spuren nach sind einige Gardisten darin gelandet. Und wie es aussieht, kamen sie nicht mehr heraus.
Der schwere Geruch von Tod dringt aus dem Container nach außen. Den Markierungen zufolge diente er dem Transport von Gardisten. Und den Spuren zufolge kamen sie nicht heraus.
Der schwere Geruch von Tod dringt aus dem Container nach außen. Den Markierungen zufolge diente er dem Transport von Gardisten. Und den Spuren zufolge kamen sie nicht heraus.
Der schwere Geruch von Tod dringt aus dem Container nach außen. Den Markierungen zufolge diente er dem Transport von Gardisten. Und den Spuren zufolge kamen sie nicht heraus.

languages.text: Du conteneur s'échappe la puanteur accablante de la mort. À en juger par les inscriptions, des gardes se sont retrouvés à l'intérieur par erreur. Et à en juger par les dégâts apparents, ils ne s'en sont pas sortis.
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: Du conteneur s'échappe la puanteur accablante de la mort. À en juger par les inscriptions, des gardes se sont retrouvés à l'intérieur par erreur. Et à en juger par les dégâts apparents, ils ne s'en sont pas sortis.
Du conteneur s'échappe la puanteur accablante de la mort. À en juger par les inscriptions, il servait au transport de gardes. Et à en juger par les dégâts apparents, ils ne s'en sont pas sortis.
Du conteneur s'échappe la puanteur accablante de la mort. À en juger par les inscriptions, il servait au transport de gardes. Et à en juger par les dégâts apparents, ils ne s'en sont pas sortis.

languages.text: Konteynerden ağır bir ölüm kokusu yayılıyor. Üzerindeki işaretlere bakılırsa birkaç Muhafız, yanlışlıkla içinde kısılı kalmış. Ezikler, içeridekilerin dışarı çıkmayı başaramadığını gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: A heavy stench of death spreads from the container. Judging by the markings, some Guardsmen ended up inside by mistake. Judging by the dents, they did not make it out.

traits.locale_text: Konteynerden ağır bir ölüm kokusu yayılıyor. Üzerindeki işaretlere bakılırsa birkaç Muhafız, yanlışlıkla içinde kısılı kalmış. Ezikler, içeridekilerin dışarı çıkmayı başaramadığını gösteriyor.
Konteynerden ağır bir ölüm kokusu yayılıyor. Üzerindeki işaretlere bakılırsa Muhafız nakliyatında kullanılmış. Ezikler, içeridekilerin dışarı çıkmayı başaramadığını gösteriyor.
